QuestData.Title: The Sigil of Awakening
QuestData.Description: This relic is too powerful to keep it out in the open.$b$bWe must return to the Vindicaar at once. The Prophet will know what to do.$b$bI did want to thank you, $n. Without you this would not be possible. Quoram would have ensured I never got near the Sigil. Perhaps some day I will share that story with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the Vindicaar and secure the Sigil of Awakening.
QuestData.RewardText: We are that much closer to restoring the Crown of the Triumvirate to its former glory.
